summary: When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.
cast: Kristen Bell|Ian Somerhalder|Christina Milian|Rick Gonzalez|Jonathan Tucker|Samm Levine|Octavia Spencer|Ron Rifkin|Joseph Gatt|Kel O'Neill|Zach Grenier|Riki Lindhome|John Burke|Mike J. Regan|Steve Tom|Robert Clotworthy|Moira Price|Di Quon|Brad Dourif|Christine Barger|Corryn Cummins|Grant George|Jeremy Guskin|Tate Hanyok|John Jurgens|Julie Lancaster|Lee Lourdes|Josh Burian Mohr|Amanda Tepe
title: Pulse (Conexión)
